DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of four weeks of treatment with two investigational drugs (oral versus inhaled administration) plus an inhaled medication in the treatment of airway constriction brought on by exercise in participants with asthma.
DOC.brief_title: Two Investigational Drugs in the Prevention of Airway Constriction Brought on by Exercise in Participants With Asthma (0476-911)
DOC.criteria: 614 year old children with a history of asthma for at least 12 months must demonstrate airway constriction brought on by exercise is taking any medications that are not allowed in the study
